Hey! Thanks for checking out my blog! You can find out more about me at my personal site!

A Blog's Purpose

Let me lead off with saying how proud I am of the title for this post. For anyone who doesn’t get it, it’s a reference to this. I'm a dog person.

My dog Lassie.



Welcome all to the first post of my blog. I'm writing this as a short introduction for (hopefully) many other posts to come. As of now, the plan is to write mostly about programming, with occasional other posts for topics I find interesting.

If all goes well and I have the hutzpah to keep this regularly updated, this’ll be a good way to document my journey as a computer science student. Maybe in five years I can look back at this and think oh god how embarrassing. That’d be nice.

I’ve never blogged before, nor do I really do much writing for leisure – but there’s a first time for everything. To the future!
